title: Looking For High Plat/Diamond + ADC For LAN Tourney In Deer Park Melbourne This Saturday
body:
Melb VIC - Over9K LoL LAN Tournament #1 | Facebook
So far we have every role apart from an ADC. Please be high plat/diamond and be able to practice with us!
https://www.facebook.com/events/1526457794315211/ <- Event Info
Deer Park, This Saturday, Double Elimination, $25 entry per person.
Add me in game if interested, if we find people, planning on practicing tomorrow (Friday) afternoon and night to see how it goes.

replies.body: Sure, I'd be happy to. I usually play Vayne+Lucian as ADC, but I play all the others to fit a situation.
Can vouch for this guy! Good attitude and strong game knowledge!
